title: Dozens of older Boeing 737 jets grounded after cracks found in wings
text:
Boeing suffered another blow as dozens more of its planes were grounded after cracks were discovered in the wings.

The structural damage was uncovered during inspections of older Boeing 737 aircraft.

It comes as the US aircraft manufacturer's 737 Max fleet remains grounded worldwide amid safety concerns following two fatal crashes that killed 346 people.

Airlines that ordered the 737 Max are considering how to ensure they are compensated for the disruption caused by the decision to halt flights.

On Tuesday, pilots at one of the world’s biggest airlines launched a legal claim against the company, accusing it of “deliberately misleading” them about the 737 Max model. Staff at Southwest Airlines...
description: Boeing suffered another blow as dozens more of its planes were grounded after cracks were discovered in the wings.
